usage_instructions.how_to_use: When applying to a job, select the template that best matches the role type. The automation system will emphasize relevant skills and tailor the resume summary accordingly.
usage_instructions.auto_detection: The system can auto-detect the best template by analyzing job title and description keywords.
usage_instructions.customization: Templates can be mixed - e.g., a 'Supply Chain Quality Manager' role might blend supply_chain_engineer + quality_engineer templates.
